required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Surgical Treatment of Long Bone Metastases
clinical_study.official_title: Surgical Treatment for Long Bone Metastases With Intramedullary Nail or Endoprosthetic Reconstruction

brief_summary.textblock: To provide treatment guidelines for patients with long bone metastatic disease based on observational study and to propose an algorithm to guide orthopedic surgeons in decision-making for these patient.

detailed_description.textblock: The objectives of this study were to examine clinical outcomes after reconstruction with intramedullary fixation (IMN) or endoprosthetic reconstruction (EPR) with a specific focus on (1) the rate of complication or failure; (2) differences in complication rates by anatomic site; (3) functional results as assessed by the Musculoskeletal Tumor Society System (MSTS); (4) differences in complication rate between patients treated with INM versus EPR; and (5) differences in survival in patients with metastatic bone disease based on disease-specific, laboratory, and demographic information.

primary_outcome.measure: Clinical outcomes after treatment of long bone metastases with intramedullary nail versus endoprosthetic reconstruction
primary_outcome.description: The objectives of this study were to examine clinical outcomes after reconstruction with intramedullary nail versus endoprosthetic reconstruction with a specific focus on differences in complication rate between patients treated with intramedullary nail versus endoprosthetic reconstruction

secondary_outcome.measure: Survival in patients undergoing surgery for metastatic bone disease
secondary_outcome.description: Provide a reliable and objective means of estimating survival in patients with metastatic bone disease based on disease-specific

intervention.description: Surgical treatment of impending or pathologic fracture in the extremities

study_pop.textblock: Patients with long bone metastases treated surgically with intramedullary nail or endoprosthetic reconstruction

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- bone metastases of the extremity
Exclusion Criteria:
- bone metastases of the spine

patient_data.ipd_description: publish a manuscript in international journal
